long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhanced Translate with ChatGPT, GPT-4o and GPT-4o-mini.

Elevate your translation experience with the power of AI! This innovative Chrome extension offers:

✅ High-quality translations powered by GPT-4 and ChatGPT
✅ Smart context understanding for improved accuracy
✅ Multiple language style options for various scenarios
✅ Instant comparison between Google and AI translations
